meta.description: Decision Tree logic for Self-Assessment Module

start.q: Do you want to prevent pregnancy right now?

hormonal_check.q: Are you comfortable using hormones (like pill, patch, implant)?

daily_routine.q: Are you good at remembering to take something every single day?

long_term.q: Do you want a method that lasts for years without maintenance?

barrier_method.q: Do you also want protection against STIs?

sti_check_path.q: Are you looking for protection solely against STIs?

res_pill.title: The Pill
res_pill.text: Oral contraceptives might be great for you. They are 99% effective if taken daily.

res_implant_iud.title: Implant or Hormonal IUD
res_implant_iud.text: These are 'set and forget' methods. The implant goes in your arm (3 years), the IUD in your uterus (3-7 years).

res_patch_ring.title: Patch or Ring
res_patch_ring.text: Try the Patch (change weekly) or the Ring (change monthly) if you don't want a daily pill.

res_condoms.title: External/Internal Condoms
res_condoms.text: The only method that prevents both pregnancy and STIs. Keep using them!

res_copper_iud.title: Copper IUD
res_copper_iud.text: A hormone-free device that lasts up to 10 years. Highly effective.

res_consult.title: Consult a Specialist
res_consult.text: Your needs sound unique. It's best to visit a clinic to discuss fertility awareness or sterilization.

start.q: Have you had unprotected sex recently?

symptoms_check.q: Do you have any symptoms? (Bumps, itchiness, discharge, pain)?

partner_check.q: Did your partner mention they might have an STI?

window_period.q: Was the unprotected sex less than 2 weeks ago?

routine_check.q: Has it been more than 6 months since your last test?

res_urgent.title: Visit a Clinic ASAP
res_urgent.text: Since you have symptoms or known exposure, please do not wait. STIs are treatable!

res_wait.title: Wait & Monitor
res_wait.text: Some tests cannot detect infections immediately. Use protection and test in 2 weeks, or visit a doctor for PEP if high risk.

res_test_now.title: Get Tested Now
res_test_now.text: You are outside the window period, so a test now will be accurate. It's good to be sure!

res_routine.title: Time for a Checkup
res_routine.text: We recommend testing every 6 months if you are sexually active, just to be safe.

res_safe.title: You're Good!
res_safe.text: Keep using protection. You seem to be up to date with your health screenings.

start.q: Did the other person say 'YES' clearly and enthusiastically?

pressure_check.q: Was there any pressure, guilt-tripping, or fear involved?

silence_check.q: Did they stay silent, freeze up, or seem unsure?

body_language.q: Did they push you away or look uncomfortable?

sobriety_check.q: Was anyone incapacitated by drugs or alcohol?

res_good.title: Sounds Healthy!
res_good.text: This sounds like a consensual, safe interaction. Communication is key!

res_bad.title: Red Flag
res_bad.text: Consent must be free, enthusiastic, and sober. If this happened to you, it is not your fault. Reach out for support.

res_communicate.title: Unclear Territory
res_communicate.text: Consent shouldn't be a guessing game. If you aren't sure, ASK. 'Are you okay with this?' is a sexy question.
